headline: Is Amazon a Smart Opportunity After Strong Growth and New AI Initiatives in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Amazon.com is a buy, a hold, or possibly overvalued? You're not alone. Investors everywhere are curious whether the company's current price tag really stacks up against its future prospects. Amazon.com shares have climbed 14.8% over the last month and are up 18.9% over the past year, but have paused recently with a -0.4% move in the last week. What is driving these moves? Recent headlines around the company's expanding AI initiatives and ongoing investments in cloud...

headline: PodcastOne (NASDAQ: PODC) Reports Record 1H & Q2 Fiscal 2026 Financial Results and Raises Full-Year Guidance, Cash $2.7 Million up $2.2 Million Year-over-Year
summary: LOS ANGELES, Nov. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PodcastOne (Nasdaq: PODC), a leading publisher and podcast sales network, today announced record financial results for the second quarter (“Q2 Fiscal 2026”) and first half (“1H Fiscal 2026”) of its fiscal year ending March 31, 2026. Financial Highlights: Q2 Fiscal 2026 Revenue: $15.2 Million, up 22% year-over-yearAdjusted EBITDA*: $1.1 Million, up 369% year-over-year 1H Fiscal 2026 Revenue: $30.2 Million, up 19% year-over-yearAdjusted EBITDA*: $1.7

headline: What is hybrid AI? Analyst explains what more companies are doing
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is hosting its analyst day at the Nasdaq on Tuesday, which could prove to be a pivotal moment as the AI chip race with competitor Nvidia (NVDA) tightens. TECHnalysis Research, LLC president Bob O'Donnell sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to explain what hybrid AI (artificial intelligence) and why he is bullish on the dynamic of hyperscalers building out AI infrastructure and investing in physical AI data centers and GPUs. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

content.title: What is hybrid AI? Analyst explains what more companies are doing
content.description:
Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) is hosting its analyst day at the Nasdaq on Tuesday, which could prove to be a pivotal moment as the AI chip race with competitor Nvidia (NVDA) tightens.

TECHnalysis Research, LLC president Bob O'Donnell sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to explain what hybrid AI (artificial intelligence) and why he is bullish on the dynamic of hyperscalers building out AI infrastructure and investing in physical AI data centers and GPUs.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Plug Power Stock Trades Wildly on AI News. Its Business Model Is Changing.
summary: Shares of hydrogen technology provider  Plug Power  were all over the place early Tuesday after the company announced a lot the previous evening—including an unusual plan to generate more liquidity by selling electricity rights to operators of artificial-intelligence data centers.  The move came after Plug Power reported third-quarter sales of $177.1 million.  After the quarter, Plug raised an additional $370 million.

content.title: Plug Power Stock Trades Wildly on AI News. Its Business Model Is Changing.
content.summary: Shares of hydrogen technology provider  Plug Power  were all over the place early Tuesday after the company announced a lot the previous evening—including an unusual plan to generate more liquidity by selling electricity rights to operators of artificial-intelligence data centers.  The move came after Plug Power reported third-quarter sales of $177.1 million.  After the quarter, Plug raised an additional $370 million.

headline: Instacart Parent’s Stock Is a Buy, Analyst Says. Can It Fend Off Amazon and Uber?
summary: Instacart  parent company  Maplebear  enjoyed a welcome reprieve on Tuesday from what has been a rough 2025, and investors in the grocery delivery leader may see more gains ahead.  Analysts at  BMO  Capital Markets upgraded Maplebear to Outperform from Market Perform and reiterated a $58 price target in a research note on Tuesday.  Instacart is growing its core customer base while also varying its revenue streams, the bank said, and its valuation looks attractive.

content.title: Instacart Parent’s Stock Is a Buy, Analyst Says. Can It Fend Off Amazon and Uber?
content.summary: Instacart  parent company  Maplebear  enjoyed a welcome reprieve on Tuesday from what has been a rough 2025, and investors in the grocery delivery leader may see more gains ahead.  Analysts at  BMO  Capital Markets upgraded Maplebear to Outperform from Market Perform and reiterated a $58 price target in a research note on Tuesday.  Instacart is growing its core customer base while also varying its revenue streams, the bank said, and its valuation looks attractive.

headline: InventHelp Client "Stack Em'" Expands Retail Presence with Scheels Launch, Amazon Growth, and Outdoor Retailer Showcase
summary: InventHelp and its sister licensing company, Intromark Incorporated, proudly announce the continued success of Stack Em', an innovative drinkware brand developed by inventor and entrepreneur Andy Beier. The brand's flagship product, the Stack Em' Can Cooler, has gained remarkable traction in the outdoor market—most recently with its retail launch at Scheels Sporting Goods, a showcase at Outdoor Retailer 2025 in Salt Lake City, and strong online performance through Amazon.com.

content.title: InventHelp Client "Stack Em'" Expands Retail Presence with Scheels Launch, Amazon Growth, and Outdoor Retailer Showcase
content.summary: InventHelp and its sister licensing company, Intromark Incorporated, proudly announce the continued success of Stack Em', an innovative drinkware brand developed by inventor and entrepreneur Andy Beier. The brand's flagship product, the Stack Em' Can Cooler, has gained remarkable traction in the outdoor market—most recently with its retail launch at Scheels Sporting Goods, a showcase at Outdoor Retailer 2025 in Salt Lake City, and strong online performance through Amazon.com.

headline: Meet The World's First AI-Led Startup: HurumoAI's Agent Offers 6 Procrastination Modes That Let AI Doomscroll So You Recharge In 30 Minutes
summary: Artificial intelligence startup HurumoAI, which calls itself the world's first AI co-founded and led enterprise, late last month launched a beta platform that allows users to delegate procrastination to AI agents. Sloth Surf offers six browsing modes, from doomscrolling social media to celebrity gossip, while automated agents handle the scrolling and return concise summaries designed to help users take quick, structured breaks. headline: Why AppLovin (APP) Shares Are Plunging Today
summary: Shares of mobile app technology company AppLovin (NASDAQ:APP) fell 7.1% in the afternoon session after the company's stock fell amid a broader sell-off in the technology sector. The ad-tech company was one of the top decliners in the S&P 500. The drop happened as part of a wider retreat in the tech industry, which also saw shares of other notable firms like Micron, Lam Research, and Nvidia fall. This widespread decline pointed to a broader negative sentiment among investors toward the tech secto
